scripts: create path /(rep:root)
create path (rep:root)/content(sling:OrderedFolder)/dhl(cq:Page)/jcr:content(nt:unstructured)
create path /etc(sling:Folder)/designs(nt:folder)
# *** deny access for gmt-tracking should be placed below all user groups and then allow access for gmt-tracking-id-editor ***
create group gmt-tracking-id-editor
create group author-language-copies
create group author-language-master
# *** Remove ACL is used to guarantee acess order (prevent potential problems of manual access changes) ***

remove ACE for author-language-copies,author-language-master
deny jcr:all on /content/dhl restriction(rep:glob,/language-masters/en-master)
allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement on /content/dhl restriction(rep:glob,/language-masters)
end

set properties on authorizable(author-language-copies)/profile
 set givenName to "Author - Language Copies"
 end

set ACL for author-language-copies
allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement on /content/dhl restriction(rep:glob,/language-masters)
end

set ACL for author-language-copies
deny jcr:all on /content/dhl restriction(rep:glob,/language-masters/en-master)
end

set ACL for author-language-copies
allow jcr:read on home(author-language-copies)
end

set properties on authorizable(author-language-master)/profile
 set givenName to "Author - Language Master"
 end
add author-language-master to group projects-administrators

set ACL for author-language-master
allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement on /content/dhl restriction(rep:glob,/language-masters)
end

set ACL for author-language-master
allow jcr:all on /conf/global
end

set ACL for author-language-master
allow jcr:read on home(author-language-master)
end
create group discover-base-user
# *** Remove ACL is used to remove previous access solution. Can be removed in future releases ***

remove ACE for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on /content
allow jcr:versionManagement,crx:replicate,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement on /content/campaigns,/content/cq:graphql,/content/launches,/content/usergenerated,/content/outbound-marketing,/content/cq:tags,/content/dam
end

set properties on authorizable(discover-base-user)/profile
 set givenName to "Discover Base User"
 set aboutMe to "Common user group with basic access rights"
 end
add discover-base-user to group author-language-copies
add discover-base-user to group contributor
add discover-base-user to group workflow-users
add discover-base-user to group analytics-administrators

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow crx:replicate on /conf restriction(rep:subtrees,/cloudconfigs)
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow crx:replicate on /libs/wcm/core/site-templates/aem-site-template-stub-2.0.0/sling:configs
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow rep:write on /etc/segmentation
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on /etc/cloudservices/dmscene7,/etc/cloudservices/dynamicmediaservices,/etc/cloudservices/scene7,/etc/importers/bulkeditor
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read,rep:write on /etc/importers/offline,/etc/reports/compreport
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on /etc/designs
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on /libs/workflow/scripts
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on home(discover-base-user)
end
# *** Remove ACL is used to guarantee order of access rights (prevent potential problems of manual access changes)***

remove ACE for discover-base-user
deny jcr:all on /content restriction(rep:glob,/dhl/*)
deny rep:write on /content restriction(rep:ntNames,cq:meta)
allow jcr:read on /content restriction(rep:ntNames,cq:meta)
allow jcr:read on /content restriction(rep:glob,/dhl/jcr:content)
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,crx:replicate,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement on /content
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
deny jcr:all on /content restriction(rep:glob,/dhl/*)
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on /content restriction(rep:glob,/dhl/jcr:content)
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
deny rep:write on /content restriction(rep:ntNames,cq:meta)
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
allow jcr:read on /content restriction(rep:ntNames,cq:meta)
end
create group author-all-countries
add author-all-countries to group discover-base-user
add author-all-countries to group author-language-master
add author-all-countries to group gmt-tracking-id-editor

 end

set ACL for author-all-countries
allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement on /content/dhl
end

set ACL for author-all-countries
allow jcr:read on home(author-all-countries)

# !!!  SHOULD BE AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS SCRIPT !!!
# *** GMP TRACKING ID ACCESS ***
# *** remove access used to guarantee order of access ***

remove ACE for discover-base-user
deny rep:write on /content/dhl restriction(rep:itemNames,gtmtrackingid)
end

remove ACE for gmt-tracking-id-editor
allow rep:write on /content/dhl restriction(rep:itemNames,gtmtrackingid)
end

set ACL for discover-base-user
deny rep:write on /content/dhl restriction(rep:itemNames,gtmtrackingid)
end

set ACL for gmt-tracking-id-editor
allow rep:write on /content/dhl restriction(rep:itemNames,gtmtrackingid)
end
